remarks: The rank of a Cartesian product when the rank of the union of its arguments is a limit ordinal.  Part of Exercise 4 of [Kunen] p. 107. See ~ rankxpsuc for the successor case.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Sep-2006.)
statement:
rankxplim.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
rankxplim.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
rankxplim $p |- ( ( Lim ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) /\ ( A X. B ) =/= (/) ) -> ( rank ` ( A X. B ) ) = ( rank ` ( A u. B ) ) ) $.
